column1: Data collection in progress by Jeremy Pressman (@djpressman, U of Connecticut) and Erica Chenoweth (@EricaChenoweth, Harvard U).
With thanks to Emma Cooper, Elannah Devlin, Namira Sristy, and Jay Ulfelder for assistance compiling sources.
We are collecting this data in the public interest and to further scholarly research.
